meanings.definition: Relating to or suffering from bedwetting.
meanings.sent1: The enuretic child felt embarrassed about wetting the bed.
meanings.sent2: She sought advice on how to help her enuretic son stay dry at night.
meanings.sent3: The enuretic puppy left a puddle on the carpet, much to the family's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The enuretic clouds released a downpour of rain on the parched land.
meanings.sent5: The enuretic alarm reminded him to wake up and use the bathroom before accidents happened.

meanings.definition: A person who regularly wets the bed.
meanings.sent1: The enuretic was too embarrassed to go on sleepovers with friends.
meanings.sent2: The enuretic's parents were understanding and supportive during this challenging time.
meanings.sent3: The enuretic accidentally watered the plants while sleepwalking one night.
meanings.sent4: The enuretic was like a secret agent, leaving behind clues of their nighttime missions.
meanings.sent5: The enuretic's siblings teased them gently but always made sure to help clean up any messes.
